statements: UPDATE game_settings SET setting_value = 'true' WHERE player_id = 101 AND setting_key = 'sound_enabled';
UPDATE game_settings SET setting_key = 'music_volume', setting_value = '75' WHERE player_id = 201;
UPDATE game_settings SET setting_value = 'on' WHERE player_id = 1 AND setting_key = 'music'
UPDATE game_settings SET player_id = 2, setting_value = 'off' WHERE setting_key = 'sound'
UPDATE player_settings SET sound_volume = 80, player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game_preferences SET max_score = 1000, difficulty_level = 2 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_settings SET player_name = 'John Doe', sound_volume = 80 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE game_preferences SET theme = 'Dark Mode', difficulty_level = 3, max_score = 10000 WHERE player_id = 456;
UPDATE game_settings SET sound_volume = 0.7, music_volume = 0.4 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE player_stats SET total_score = 10000, level = 10, lives = 3 WHERE player_id = 54321;
UPDATE game_settings SET sound_volume = 0.8, music_volume = 0.5 WHERE player_id = 1234;
UPDATE player_preferences SET theme = 'dark', language = 'ENG' WHERE player_id = 5678;
UPDATE game_settings SET sound_volume = 80, music_volume = 60 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE player_preferences SET theme_color = 'Blue', language = 'French' WHERE player_id = 65432;
UPDATE game_settings SET sound_volume = 80, music_volume = 60 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE player_statistics SET total_score = 5000, games_played = 100, highest_level_completed = 10 WHERE player_id = 54321;
UPDATE PlayerPreferences SET sound_volume = 80, music_volume = 60 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE player_id = 54321 AND item_id = 1001;
UPDATE PlayerPreferences SET sound_volume = 80, display_name = 'New Display Name' WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE SavedGames SET save_data = '{"progress": "50% complete", "level": 5}', save_name = 'Midway Save' WHERE player_id = 54321 AND save_id = 10;
